英文公告.附加說明: 1.Acceptance test will be conducted following part 6 of specification. In this part,each furnace will really test with full size of tube for burst test at 800Cx150MPa and endurance test at least 48 hours with specified temperature and pressure.2.The training course should not be less than12 hours.3.The manufacture must provide performance test report.4.The manufacture must provide user's manuals, maintenance manuals and configuration figures.5.Quotation list of each part must be provided.6.Bid bound : NT$ 1,155,000 by check or T/T (100%). 7.One copy of most recent business tax certificate or income tax certificate.
